bibdata.abstract: Guidance for the specification and performance of an arc-flash hazard calculation study, in accordance with the process defined in IEEE Std 1584&#8482;, is provided in this document. It outlines the minimum recommended requirements to enable the owner to specify an arc-flash hazard calculation study, including scope of work and associated deliverables.
